name: LUCTUS
description:
this project is still in active development.

I'll try to post updates and other stuff regularly.

+++ CONNECTION ESTABLISHED +++

OH, WE HAVE SOMEONE.

HELLO, SOO, WE HAVE A CONNECTION BETWEEN YOUR WORLD AND THEIRS.
AND, RIGHT NOW THERE IS A CERTAIN GIRL THAT HAVE A CERTAIN PROBLEM.

SHE...
WELL, LET'S JUST SAY SHE HAVE BEEN HELL BENT ON REVENGE.
SHE HAS ALREADY GOT IT THOUGH.

SHE GOT HER REVENGE.



BUT, SHE...
AHHH, SHE LOST IT.

HER ANGER KINDA OVER FUELED HER.

WELL, SHE HAS OTHER PEOPLE THAT HELPS HER THROUGH THIS, BUT...
I DON'T THINK HE IS CAPABLE ENOUGH TO HELP.

SO THAT'S WHERE YOU COME IN.

I NEED YOU TO HELP HER.

OH, DON'T WORRY ABOUT FAILING OR ANYTHING...
IF SHE FAILS WE CAN JUST ALWAYS GO BACK.
THE SYSTEM THAT WE HAVE IS CAPABLE OF GOING BACK TO THE STATE WHERE YOU HAVEN'T FAILED. MORE LIKE WE JUST PUT A DIFFERENT REFERENCE POINT TO...

....

AHHHHH

YOU DON'T CARE ABOUT ALL THIS MUMBO JUMBO NERDY STUFF. 
LET'S JUST SAY WE CAN TIME TRAVEL IN THEIR WORLD.

WELL, WE DIDN'T JUST DO THIS BECAUSE WE CARE FOR HER.
THERE IS STILL SOMETHING IN IT FOR US.
OUR SYSTEM IS STILL EXPERIMENTAL, AND WE NEEDED A TEST.
MIGHT AS WELL TRY TO DO SOME GOOD IN THIS WORLD RIGHT?

SO WHAT DO YOU SAY?
WILL YOU HELP?
